alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 9:25AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Buchanan, northwestern Dubuque, southeastern Benton, northwestern Jones, Delaware and Linn Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 924 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Coggon to near Atkins. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Coggon around 930 AM CDT. Ryan around 935 AM CDT. Marion around 940 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Alburnett, Hopkinton, Delhi, Delaware, Central City, Earlville, Waubeek, Whittier, Paris, Prairieburg, Stone City, Dyersville, New Vienna and Luxemburg. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 20 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque; Jones; Linn
